docs.snippet: Mr. McGinniss’s books examined political figures like Sarah Palin and Richard M. Nixon and, in ‘Fatal Vision,’ a notorious criminal case....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. McGinniss’s books examined political figures like Sarah Palin and Richard M. Nixon and, in ‘Fatal Vision,’ a notorious criminal case.
docs.abstract: Joe McGinniss, the author who reported on political campaigns and murder cases in the books The Selling of the President and Fatal Vision, dies at age 71.

headline.main: Joe McGinniss, 71, Dies; Chronicled Politics and Sensational Crime
headline.print_headline: Joe McGinniss, Who Chronicled Politics and the ‘Fatal Vision’ Case, Dies at 71
